channel.title: buzz on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in buzz on TechnoStreet

item.title: Watch: Driver Parks His Bus On Busy Road For Tea Break, Causes Traffic Jam
item.description: Watch: Driver Parks His Bus On Busy Road For Tea Break, Causes Traffic Jam The man runs towards the bus with a cup of tea in his hand.

item.title: ‘Never Stop Learning’: Harsh Goenka Shares Seven New Year Resolutions for 2023
item.description: ‘Never Stop Learning’: Harsh Goenka Shares Seven New Year Resolutions for 2023 Just like the rest of us, industrialist Harsh Goenka shared his list of New Year's resolutions.

item.title: 'Mastery': Dramatic Video of Eagle Catching a Fish Will Leave You Stunned
item.description: ‘Mastery’: Dramatic Video of Eagle Catching a Fish Will Leave You Stunned In a clip shared on Twitter, the powerful force of kill or be killed can be seen.

item.title: When Kylian Mbappe Dressed up as Santa Claus to Hand out Gifts to Refugee Kids in Paris
item.description: When Kylian Mbappe Dressed up as Santa Claus to Hand out Gifts to Refugee Kids in Paris Kylian Mbappe collaborated with the PSG Foundation to distribute gifts to refugee children in 2019.

item.title: Did Elon Musk Just Compare Himself to Batman? Twitter Won't Stand For it
item.description: Did Elon Musk Just Compare Himself to Batman? Twitter Won’t Stand For it Elon Musk was widely roasted after tweeting a cartoon of Batman with the caption 'Some nights.

item.title: Video of Pets Getting Haircuts by Thailand Groomer is too Cute to Miss
item.description: Video of Pets Getting Haircuts by Thailand Groomer is too Cute to Miss This clip shows a hairdresser giving adorable haircuts to cats and dogs.

item.title: North Korea Wants Citizens to Give Children 'Patriotic' Names Like 'Bomb', 'Gun'
item.description: North Korea Wants Citizens to Give Children ‘Patriotic’ Names Like ‘Bomb’, ‘Gun’ North Korean government is reportedly cracking down on those failing to comply with the direction to give 'patriotic' names such as 'Bomb', 'Gun' and 'Satellite' to their kids.

item.title: One-horned Rhinoceros Turns Violent in Assam’s Kaziranga Park, Leaves Two Injured
item.description: One-horned Rhinoceros Turns Violent in Assam’s Kaziranga Park, Leaves Two Injured A female rhino at the Kaziranga National Park attacked two persons on Saturday when they were engaged in road clearance work.

item.title: 102-year-old Woman Finds Her Stillborn Baby's Grave After 76 Long Years
item.description: 102-year-old Woman Finds Her Stillborn Baby’s Grave After 76 Long Years She delivered the baby knowing that it is dead and for more than seven decades after the traumatic event, the elderly woman did not know what happened next.
